entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Rain beginning this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near noon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
